alert.note: Alert for Clay; Putnam; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 6:47PM EDT until August 17 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... Northeastern Putnam County in northeastern Florida... East central Clay County in northeastern Florida... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 646 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from South Ponte Vedra to 8 miles south of World Golf Village to near Bostwick, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Hastings, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Bostwick, Federal Point, South Ponte Vedra, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores and Butler Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
